word_mean: 庸医，江湖医生：冒充内行而不具应有知识及技能者，在医学上则为庸医

sentence.Network_en: That charlatan! I lost thousands of dollars because I followed his advice.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个骗子! 听了他的话,我损失了好几千美元.

sentence.Network_en: He was exposed as a charlatan.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被揭穿，原来是个骗子。

sentence.Network_en: He was sure that he was dealing with a charlatan.
sentence.Network_cn: 他真以为自己遇上了江湖骗子.

list 5 canvass --- cogent ... chaotic 混乱的, 无秩序的 charlatan 吹牛者, 江湖骗子 chasm 深渊，大差别，代沟.

松松：3天背完GRE难词 ... chameleon：n. 变色龙 10。 charlatan：n. 吹牛者 11。 braggadocio：n. 自夸, 吹牛大王 12。.

list.abs: Whether he is an outstanding artist or a charlatan ?, 他究竟是一个杰出的艺术家还是一个江湖骗子?
An unqualified or dishonest practitioner ; a charlatan ., 骗子一个不合格或不诚实的实践者 ; 一个骗子.
those charlatans and crooks in Washington debased the dollar and keep right on doing it , grinning like idiots while they ruin us .华盛顿的那些骗子和无赖使美元贬值，并且还在继续这样干着，他们一边毁灭我们，一边却在傻笑。
She is not charlatan , or a psychic - shes a synaesthete ., 她不是瞎吹的 , 或是一个神经病 - 她是一个通感者.
A quack or charlatan ., 庸医或江湖骗子.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (denoting an itinerant seller of supposed remedies): from French, from Italian ciarlatano, from ciarlare 'to babble'

entry.def: You describe someone as a charlatan when they pretend to have skills or knowledge that they do not really possess.

example.ex: He was exposed as a charlatan.
example.tran: 他被揭穿，原来是个骗子。

means.word_mean: 1. a flamboyant deceiver; one who attracts customers with tricks or jokes
